column5: The fourth drowning victim this month involving anglers has happened in NW Ontario. For heavens sake guys wear your PFD. All the drownings have the same thing in common, not wearing the PFD and being quickly overcome with changing weather and conditions. Be safe .

Thumper: GREAT ADVICE, but no matter how much it is given, some people just won't heed the warning!! A fellow drowned at LOTW when he fell out of the boat to just get a HAT. It just is not worth it. Keep PREACHING THOUGH.....Kaz
